original_title: Temptation at the Baths: Pharoah's Bathhouse Fantasies
overview: There is nothing harder to resist than temptation. When muscular men surround you at all corners of your kingdom you're going to have absolutely no choice to succumb to your fantasies. Not only do the likes of Frank Miller, Raul Mathews, Fred Goldsmith, and a host of others do that, they do it in historical fashion.
title: Temptation at the Baths: Pharoah's Bathhouse Fantasies
